title: Gate Veteran (5C99)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Minion • Orc
Strength:	7
Vitality:	2
Site:	6
Game Text:	When you play this minion, you may exert him and spot 6 companions to draw a card.
Lore:	”…the day-guards, evil-eyed and fell, were marching to their posts.”
Rarity:	C
